title: riot is useless
body: so i bought a rp card today and have been trying to redeem it but all it is saying is we apologize wtf!!!! i payed for it so i can use it not so i can get a apology saying that i cant have it. Can someoe pllz help me

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear you're unable to redeem your RP card, what specific error are you receiving?

If you're receiving the following error message

>We apologize, but the store is unable to process your payment at this time. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If this problem persists, please contact us at http://support.leagueoflegends.com/.

Which it sounds like you are, then please try again later as the store may be currently experiencing issues.

If after a reasonable amount of time has passed, you're still unable to redeem your card, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only people who are able to assist with situations like these.

If you're not receiving the above error message, please take a look at the [Prepaid Card support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Payment-Method-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-) for more information.
